DOC.brief_title: F-18 RGD-K5 Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) Participants With Carotid Artery Stenosis
DOC.detailed_description: This investigation conduct Phase II , open-label , single-center , non-randomized study . The study plan conduct one Investigative site United States . The information collect exploratory , Phase II study use diagnostic purpose , ass participant 's response therapy , clinical management participant . This pilot prospective cohort study increase expression integrin may see F-18 RGD-K5 PET image scan look carotid plaque participant carotid artery stenosis . Each complete study participant undergo one three visit , include one eligibility study visit , Computed Tomography ( CT ) angiogram carotid visit ( necessary ) , [ F-18 ] RGD-K5 PET image visit , 24 hour follow phone call visit . Procedures : Informed consent ( ICF ) , eligibility blood lab , collection demographic information medical history , physical examination , vital sign , 12-lead Electrocardiograms ( ECGs ) , dose [ F-18 ] RGD-K5 , PET image scan , 24 hour follow collect adverse event , plaque immunohistochemical characterization Carotid Endarterectomy ( CEA ) .
